items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System should handle at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates must be delivered with 99.9% reliability.

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new boards and invite team members.
Tasks can be dragged and dropped between columns representing different statuses.
dependencies: Database schema for boards and tasks
non_functional: Board loading time should not exceed 2 seconds.
UI should be responsive across desktop and mobile devices.

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made include the need for real-time updates and shared boards as core collaboration features.
